ValidationRule.description: Check if Phone Number start with +36 or 0036
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.DeveloperName ="HU_Account", NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)), NOT(AND(OR(LEN(Phone)==11, LEN(Phone)==12), LEFT(Phone, 3) == "+36", ISNUMBER(RIGHT(Phone,LEN(Phone)-3)))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Phone Number should contain country code and not have spaces
